scenarios: Issue Links (relates to / is related to)

fields.description:
Alfred prepared the Batmobile in the Batcave. The Riddler left cryptic clues for Batman. Scarecrow spread fear toxin throughout the city.The Batmobile raced through the streets. Two-Face made decisions with his coin.Robin trained with Batman in Wayne Manor.

The Joker escaped from Arkham Asylum again. Alfred prepared the Batmobile in the Batcave. Mr. Freeze sought a cure for his wife. Mr. Freeze sought a cure for his wife. Robin trained with Batman in Wayne Manor. Penguin operated his criminal empire from the Iceberg Lounge.
Nightwing assisted Batman on patrol. The utility belt contained many useful gadgets. Penguin operated his criminal empire from the Iceberg Lounge. Poison Ivy controlled the plants in Robinson Park.
